channel.title: 2 case 9179's
channel.description:
[317] PkPlanet Source v3 [317]
Hi guys, I have been adding a portal that looks like this when you click on it: [code] Green Dragons King Black Dragon Shops >---More---<[/code] When you click more, it shows you more options. Ok, so when I click more I get these options now: [code] Woodcutting God Wars Dungeon Beginning Training Rock crabs[/code] But when you click god wars dungeon in teleports you to kbd instead. I know why, the first page when I click the kbd, I get case 9179. This is the same for when i click gwd. How can I make it so that if its in page two, and i select case 9179, it actually teleports me to gwd?
Thanks, all help is appreciated. P.S please don't tell me to make 2 seperate portals, becuz I wanna go more advanced :)

item.title: 2 case 9179's
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[317] PkPlanet Source v3 [317]

Hi guys, I have been adding a portal that looks like this when you click on it:

[code]
Green Dragons
King Black Dragon
Shops

—More—<[/code]
When you click more, it shows you more options. Ok, so when I click more I get these options now:

Woodcutting God Wars Dungeon Beginning Training Rock crabs But when you click god wars dungeon in teleports you to kbd instead. I know why, the first page when I click the kbd, I get case 9179. This is the same for when i click gwd. How can I make it so that if its in page two, and i select case 9179, it actually teleports me to gwd?

Thanks, all help is appreciated. P.S please don’t tell me to make 2 seperate portals, becuz I wanna go more advanced
